title: Tuesday in November
creator_credit: United States. Office of War Information and Arthur Zegart
brief_description: Portrays the 1944 American Presidential election from the pre-election nominating conventions through the party campaigns to election day in November. Explains the organisation and structure of government in the United States.
creator_credit_for_label: United States. Office of War Information and Arthur Zegart
